text:
Hi all,
I'm using the new style_fields to update a custom button; before I had put some settings in "content" that now I wanted to insert in the new "style" tab but, while before, editing in the page and clicking on the "style" tab I could hide or display the module  (in this case the button) for desktop and/or mobile, now, if I insert my styles with the new method, I don't find anymore the possibility to hide or display the module as I did before.
How can I insert the possibility, as it was before, to display or hide my module between desktop and mobile?
Thanks
If I am understanding your question correctly — you can still add a boolean in your style tab and control the visibility of the form on the page from there.
child themes are not printing out default field values. I’ve tried copying the fields.json and deleting it, but no luck.
